original_text: If they had been thinking of that land from which they had gone out, they would have had opportunity to return.
korean_text: 그들이 나온 바 본향을 생각하였더라면 돌아갈 기회가 있었으려니와

sentences.original_text: If they had been thinking of that land
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그 땅을 생각하고 있었다면

sentences.original_text: from which they had gone out
they would have had opportunity to return
